examples.example: 疫情期间，我在家也能过得丰富多彩，充实而快乐。

translate.english: During the epidemic period, I can also live a rich and colorful life at home, full and happy.

examples.example: 周末我喜欢在家安静地读一本好书，享受惬意时光。

translate.english: On weekends, I like to quietly read a good book at home and enjoy the pleasant time.

examples.example: 春节的时候，我们一家人在家欢聚一堂，十分温馨。

translate.english: During the Spring Festival, our whole family gathers together at home, very warm.
